resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108691</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108691</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086745</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">PLoS One</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">PLoS Eins</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">PLoS Un</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">PLoS Um</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">PLoS Uno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">PLoS ένα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">PLoS Uno</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">PLoS ONE will be a high-volume, efficient and economical system for the publication of peer-reviewed research in all areas of science and medicine. It will provide a unique forum for community dialogue using the full potential of the web to accelerate scientific progress.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">PLoS MAN ist ein high-volume, leistungsfähiges und
ökonomisches System für die Publikation der Gleich-wiederholten 
Forschung in allen Bereichen der Wissenschaft und der Medizin. 
Es stellt ein eindeutiges Forum für Gemeinschaft zur 
Verfügung, die der Dialog, der das volle Potential des Webs 
verwendet, wissenschaftlichen Fortschritt beschleunigen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">PLoS UN sera un système à fort débit, efficace 
et économique pour la publication de la recherche pair-passée en 
revue dans tous les secteurs scientifiques et la médecine. Il 
fournira un seul forum pour la communauté que le dialogue utilisant 
la pleine capacité du Web accélèrent le progrès scientifique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">PLoS UM será um sistema high-volume, eficiente e 
econômico para a publicação da pesquisa par-revista em todas as 
áreas de ciência e de medicina. Fornecerá um forum original 
para a comunidade que o diálogo que usa o potencial cheio do Web 
acelera o progresso científico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">PLoS UNO sarà un sistema in grande quantità, 
efficiente ed economico per la pubblicazione di ricerca pari-rivista 
in tutti i settori scientifici e la medicina. Fornirà una 
tribuna unica per Comunità che il dialogo che usando la piena 
capacità del Web accelera il progresso scientifico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">PLoS ΚΑΠΟΙΟ θα είναι ένα αποδοτικού και 
οικονομικού σύστημα υψηλής έντασης, για τη δημοσίευση της 
όμοιος-αναθεωρημένης έρευνας σε όλοι τομέας της επιστήμης και 
της ιατρικής. Θα παράσχει ένα μοναδικό φόρουμ για το 
κοινοτικό διαλογικό παράθυρο χρησιμοποιώντας την πλήρη 
δυνατότητα του Ιστού να επιταχύνει η επιστημονική πρόοδος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">PLoS UNO será un sistema en grandes cantidades, 
eficiente y económico para la publicación de la investigación 
par-repasada en todas las áreas de la ciencia y de la medicina. 
Proporcionará a un foro único para la comunidad que el 
diálogo que usa la capacidad máxima del Web acelera progreso 
científico.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086745</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108691</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/plos-one</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
